Header: Two policemen remanded over on Ratgama incident
Content: The two policemen arrested in connection with abducting and killing of two businessmen of the Ratgama area were remanded till the 13 th of this month. A Sub Inspector of Police and a Police Constable who were taken into custody in regard to the assassinationcase were remanded by the Galle Magistrateâ€™s court. Seven more police officers are in remand custody at present in connection with the same incident.
